title: Drive Thru Workers, Sorry Employees, First Dates, Broke Millennials and more.
itunes:title: Drive Thru Workers, Sorry Employees, First Dates, Broke Millennials and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Is something going on with Shirley? The CEO talks about Mo Money Mo Problems. We salute the drive thru workers because of the things they hear daily. Big Dog has a special timeline for on old business partner. Junior has an upcoming first date with Truth Be Told. How do you know when you are lost? Fool #2 got a new book about ain't ish kinfolk. What is the real reason millennials are going broke? Uncle Steve has a Little Tommy story. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO talks about faith without works is dead, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
